Description: Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars!!! shipping to the lower 48 states,no PO Boxes.I will not ship anywhere else,Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars at my ebay store "Axes Bold As Love Guitars". I have added a new part to my ending statement.I now recommend that all the guitars I sell be set up to your preferences. ALL GUITARS MAY REQUIRE SET UP!!!  Players have such varied opinions that I no longer want to hear about it.     Here is a very cool  First Act ME953 Double Cutaway Electric Guitar with some nice upgrades. Looks a bit like an old Les Paul Junior with tremolo. I upgraded the pickup with a  hot Black/White Zebra humbucker,about 15k.Next I added a push/pull tone control so you can split the humbucker into a single coil. I also upgraded the capacitor to a nice Orange Drop style .022uf epoxy film capacitor. The guitar sounds way better than stock. Guitar shows some player wear with some slightly heavier scratches on the top near the control knobs,a chip on the back edge that has been touched up,and an area on the back with some heavier scratches.Action is good and could probably be lowered even more. Comes with a nice First Act gigbag. A very cool guitar period!  I describe all guitars to the best of my abilities.I don't take every guitar apart to check every freaking screw.I disclose all pimples just so there are no misunderstandings.All guitars are sold as is. Insurance is included in my shipping and handling charges.I will not ship out of the U.S. My feedback is public record,and I aim to keep it good. I will no longer do local pickups period. Make sure to look at all pictures carefully,ask all question before you bid! All sales are final,and there will be no refunds, or returns unless you can prove an item was grossly misrepresented. Consider this a contract if you bid. Sorry it has to be like that,blame the clever scam artist that spend all their time trying to beat somebody instead of working!
